backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor and all data types for sessions, documents, channels, messages, files, images, and related responses.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan detailing scenarios for player and session document uploads, visibility, markup, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point initializing stored theme mode and loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, startup guard, logout, and global scaling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays an error screen with reload and clear-local-data options.
frontend/src/components/app/StartupFailu: Startup failure UI showing initialization errors with actions to reload or clear local data.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Channel chat interface handling message sending, replies, image uploads, and auto‑scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders individual chat messages with avatars, reply previews, long‑press detection, and user identity handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add and delete functionality, including confirmation dialogs and error handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses document content to render text and embedded file references, supporting images and downloadable files.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor enabling content editing, file uploads, preview mode, and saving with error and progress handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog component for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Full editor for player documents supporting content editing, file uploads, image insertion, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component that displays a profile image or fallback initials with size options.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: UI for uploading, previewing, and removing a user's profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/QuickCha: Dialog for setting a temporary display name and avatar stored locally for quick chat use.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting channels within a session, with backend calls and validation.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking host-owned documents, with backend calls and local state for errors and loading. Supports both controlled create dialogs and in-place rename/delete flows.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import UI for hosts, including file parsing, confirmation dialogs, and backend calls to save or load session data. Shows errors and loading states during operations.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Supplies dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting members' channels using mutation hooks. Manages form state, validation, and success/error handling for channel operations.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Contains dialogs and menus for creating, renaming, deleting, and toggling visibility of player documents. Integrates mutation hooks and UI components for owner-specific document actions.
Displays a list of player documents with ownership and privacy indicators, and allows selecting or creating new documents. Wraps creation dialog and triggers refetching after updates.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog component for listing, creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting session documents using related hooks.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar UI for channel navigation, quick profile, UI scale, and collapsing behavior within a session.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings screen for theme, background, nickname, templates, and preference resets before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/components/settings/UIScale: Popover for adjusting UI scale via slider or numeric input with persistence in user preferences.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider handling user preferences load, save, update, reset, and theme application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to authentication, refreshing dependent queries on change.
Detects actor initialization failures or timeouts and reports startup errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and updating document comments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, and uploading document file references with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Hooks to list document images and add images to session or player documents, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and hooks to manage auth client creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Hooks to list, fetch, create, rename, delete, edit, and update visibility of player documents with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Simple hook that runs a callback on a set interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the preferences context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickChatProfile.t: Manages loading, saving, and clearing a user's quick chat profile from local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Aggregates session, channels, member channels, and messages queries with polling; includes mutations for members' channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Hooks to list, fetch, create, rename, delete, and edit session documents with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user's display name from their profile or falls back to a shortened principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for loading, saving, and modifying user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables and layout rules for chat, sessions, and communities UI.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and sessionStorage for app reset.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes file marker tags in document text.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes image marker tags in document text.
frontend/src/lib/documentPreviewMarkup.t: Parses text into tokens and renders inline markup with spoilers, underlines, and prefixed styles.
frontend/src/lib/myCommunitiesHiddenStor: Manages storage of hidden community IDs using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user preferences with validation and clamping for UI scale.
frontend/src/lib/quickChatProfileStorage: Loads, saves, validates, and clears quick chat profile data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command patterns and checks for allowed characters.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export JSON files with version validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Manages saving, loading, clearing, and validating session templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable time or date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CommunitiesHubPage.ts: Defines the Communities Hub UI with tabs, search, and local hide-state for community cards, using static community lists.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements hosting and joining sessions with forms, validation, template application, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Manages the main session UI including channels, documents, and navigation, with state for selected views and dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and pending requests for the Communities Hub.
